text:
Thanks <@U010M6T8DEW> & <@U01BBV0L2CF> !
I forgot the "s" at the end of "inputs" in my payload .., I still don't understand why with a bad payload and a bad id the API is responding correctly.
Have a nice day !
Thank you, it sorted it out

I am using HubSpot API V3. For example, when I do GET call <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/companies>. I can only see the default properties, how can I retrieve all properties default + custom properties?

Hi <@U01TAP4987Q> You can define the properties you'd like to be returned in the query string. For example:
```GET
<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/companies/{{COMPANY_ID}}?properties=domain,website&hapikey={{HAPIKEY}}>```
You'll need to reference the internal property names (in the example they are "domain", "website")

This way will be long API connection string  because number of custom properties in an object is a lot. I am looking for way to retrieve all default and custom properties without declaring property names?
<@U01TAP4987Q> I'm not sure that's possible (off the top of my head). I could be wrong, but I don't remember seeing that anywhere on my HubSpot API travels so far.
If you don't have any luck, you could consider adding the idea here: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Ideas/ct-p/ideas>
I see. But I am wondering if we are able to get default properties without declaring the properties in API connection WHY it is not possible to do so if we want to get custom properties?

<@U01TAP4987Q> I'm guessing it's simply a feature that hasn't been considered yet. I completely agree it could be useful. Let me know if you submit via the ideas link I shared previously - I'd happily upvote it :slightly_smiling_face:
Thank you <@U010M6T8DEW> I have already submitted the idea.
No problem, can you share the link to your submitted idea on this thread please? Thanks <@U01TAP4987Q>

Does anyone know how to integrate "NetworkForGood"(NFG)?
We have a requirement from a non-profit org, and they are using NFG software for fundraising, so need to sync up donors information to HS while making the donation.
and if the NFG is not the best match to integrate with HS then any other similar software recommendations?  or any Zapier?
